page_1.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: Ah, howdy once againt. x I didn't expect another call sO soon.

page_4.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: Okay, so, just outta curiosity, what's with the imposing door?

page_6.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: NATdRALLY, TTS THERE AS A SECdRITY MEASURE
page_7.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: True, Papyrus, but there's more to the story than that.
page_8.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: You see, long ago, we monsters fled deep into the Underground.
page_9.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: We feared the humans would pursue us, so. We constructed this door..
page_10.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: And we filled the Ruins with puzzles. as an added precaution.
page_11.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: QH NY GOpTSTT TIME FOR A PUZZLE HIstOry LESSON?!
page_12.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: Hohot Well, perhaps at some point,. but as I was saying.
page_13.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: The. Ruins were our original home, which we called... well, Home.
page_14.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: Yes, I know it's not the most original name, but it got the job done.
page_15.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: But it's kinda weird. x The Ruins feel so cut off from everything.
page_16.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: Oh, well, it's partly a matter of keeping out the cold..
page_17.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: And partly a matter of privacy. After all,. SO much has changed..
page_18.png-顶部文本框有头像非战斗: But don't worryt My door is always open to you. two.
